import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk update asset custom fields"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/bulk/set-info"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates custom field values for multiple assets in a single operation. Use this for mass-updating asset metadata like purchase dates, warranty information, or custom tracking fields.

**Prerequisites**
1. **AssetIds** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) to identify target assets and extract `Items[].AssetId`.
2. **CustomFieldId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/custom-fields](/docs/api/custom-fields/search-custom-fields) filtered by `EntityType=Asset` to get field definitions.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search for target assets: [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) with location or type filters.
2. Get custom field definitions: [GET /api/v1.0/custom-fields](/docs/api/custom-fields/search-custom-fields).
3. Submit [POST /api/v1.0/assets/bulk/set-info](/docs/api/assets/bulk-set-asset-info) with AssetIds and field values.

**Minimal Required Fields**: AssetIds array, field/value pairs

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"AssetIds":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"Request":{"type":"object","properties":{"Values":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"Key":{"type":"string","description":"Custom field identifier (e.g., $assets.custom-field:{id})"},"Value":{"type":"string","description":"Value to assign to the custom field","nullable":true}},"required":["Key"],"title":"AssetBulkSetInfoValue"}}}}},"required":["AssetIds","Request"],"title":"AssetBulkSetInfoRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Asset custom fields updated"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
